name: 施易
bio_zh:
我目前是西北工业大学自动化学院的二年级（2024年-至今）博士研究生，师从张鼎文教授和韩军伟教授。

我的研究兴趣包括多模态融合、目标检测。
bio_en:
I am currently a second-year Ph.D. student (2024–present) at the School of Automation, Northwestern Polytechnical University, under the supervision of Professor Dingwen Zhang and Professor Junwei Han.

My research interests include multimodal fusion and object detection.
